```{r}

library(data.table)
```

```{r}
instance = readRDS("instance.rds")
```

```{r}
data = as.data.table(instance$archive)

data[, runtime := as.numeric(difftime(timestamp, data$timestamp[1]))]
data_100 = data[subsample.frac == 1]
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(data_100, aes(x = runtime, y = classif.bacc)) +
  geom_point()
```
